name: Astro Rocks
description:
Astro Rocks 

is a game about dodging asteroids and shooting bullets in space! Take control of your ship and use the precise controls to carefully dodge asteroids coming at you from all angles. Be careful though, there are enemy ships wandering space ready to attack you at any moment...

Features 
  • Win games on different difficulties to unlock new skins and modes!
  • Includes an endless mode and a chaotic frenzy mode!
  • Reach different goals and unlock new skins for your ship!
  • Amazing original 8-bit soundtrack made by Bit by Bit Bert!
  • Easy to learn and addictive gameplay!
  • Various enemy types and power ups!
  • Shoot rocks, become epic!
